main event: Three flashing, red, oval-shaped objects were observed moving in the vicinity of three jet fighters from Shaw AFB.
interesting points: The objects moved in no particular pattern.
The observer used binoculars to observe the objects.
The objects were visible for about 25 minutes.
The weather was clear with calm winds at the time of the sighting.
The Air Force concluded that the sighted objects were likely conventional jet aircraft, and no further investigation was required.
